REUSABLE CERTIFIED STANDARD

Made to be used again and again

Overview

Reusable Certified recognises products designed for repeated use - cutting waste and saving resources with every cycle. Each product is independently assessed against robust, evidence-based criteria, giving customers confidence that choosing reusable really makes a difference.

Eligible product systems include:

  • Backpack
  • Handbag
  • Pyjamas
  • sports
  • Blazer
  • Boots
  • Jacket
  • Scarf
  • Trousers
  • Coats
  • Dress
  • Leggings
  • Shorts
  • Vest
  • Earmuff
  • Hat
  • Jeans
  • Outerwear
  • Pants
  • Shirts

*Product material restrictions apply

Don't see your product?

Get in touch and let us know what else you'd like included.

Contact us

DID YOU KNOW?

1,973A stainless steel straw needs to be reused 1,973 times before it breaks even - that's the number of uses required for it to have lower environmental impact than its single-use equivalent.
